uint32_t am_devices_fireball_control (am_devices_fireball_control_e eState, void *pArgs)
 Set FIREBALL state. More...
 

Detailed Description

Control the Ambiq FIREBALL board.

This module contains functions for controlling the Ambiq internal FIREBALL board.
